articles.title: Jaylen Brown scores 30 as Celtics snap Cavaliers’ win streak
articles.description:
Sam Hauser scored 21 points off the bench for Boston, which has won two straight since opening the season with three losses in a row.

articles.title: Quincy mayor proposes reduced raise after backlash over 79 percent increase
articles.description:
The proposal will revise Mayor Thomas Koch’s expected raise from $285,000 to $225,000 when it takes effect in 2028.

The post Quincy mayor proposes reduced raise after backlash over 79 percent increase appeared first on Boston.com.
